name: 陳煒朋
objective: 本課程主要介紹在管理與財務決策上所需要的數量方法與分析工具，而在分析方法的數學與統計上的觀念，除了演算邏輯的介紹外，也將利用EXCEL來進行實際的估計與運算，藉以結合資訊與財務的應用。
schedule:
Week 01 Overview
Week 02 Linear Equations (線性方程式)
Week 03 Elementary Matrix Algebra (矩陣代數)
Week 04 Linear Programming Models (線性規劃模型)
Week 05Linear Programming Applications (線性規劃之應用)
Week 06 Integer Programming (整數規劃)
Week 07 Goal Programming and Nonlinear Programming (目標規劃與非線性規劃)
Week 08 Review (進度整理與複習)
Week 09 Midterm Examination (期中考)
Week 10 Introduction to Excel QM
Week 11 Decision Analysis (決策分析)
Week 12 Decision Making Under Uncertainty and Risk (考量不確定性與風險的決策制定)
Week 13 Transportation and Assignment Models (運輸與指派模型)
Week 14 Network Model (網路模型)
Week 15 Inventory Control Models(存貨管理模型)
Week 16 Simulation Modeling (模擬分析)
Week 17 Review (進度整理與複習)
Week 18 Final Examination (期末考)
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam (期中考): 35%
Final Exam (期末考): 35%
Assignment (小考、作業): 30%
materials:
Render, B., R.M. Stair, Jr., and M.E. Hanna, (2015), Quantitative Analysis for anagement, 12e, Pearson. (華泰書局)
Balakrishnan, N., B. Render, and R.M. Stair, Jr., (2013), Managerial Decision Modeling with Spreadsheets, 3e, Pearson. (高立圖書)
張保隆，2005，管理數學，第二版。(華泰書局)
